translation.en: [man] Hey! Where's the drums?
Shark!
Shark!
Shark!
Help!
Help!
Gina! Lizzie! See if you can scare them off. Go!
translation.ja: ジーナ リジー　追い払って

translation.en: Tyler. Eric. Get him out of there.
translation.ja: タイラー エリック 救助して

translation.en: Come on, man.
You're safe now.
Who are you guys?
Oh, us?
We're Malibu Junior Rescue.
translation.ja: マリブ･ジュニア･ レスキュー

translation.en: Do you have to say the "Junior" part? It makes us sound like weenies.
translation.ja: “ジュニア”をつけると ダサい

translation.en: Lizzie says I make it sound cool.
translation.ja: リジーはかっこいいと

translation.en: Dude, she's your girlfriend.
Lizzie thinks everything you do is cool.
She's pretty great, isn't she?
translation.ja: 彼女(かのじょ)は最高だよな

translation.en: Hang on to your butts!
Hey!
Come back!
Dylan, Tyler fell overboard!
[Tyler] Hey!
Hey!
Are you okay?
I am now.
You saved me, Dylan.
You're amazing.
[high-pitched voice] What was that?
Mom, I just had the weirdest dream.
translation.ja: ママ 変な夢を見た

translation.en: [mother's voice] What was it, sweetheart?
Dylan, you okay?
Yeah, I'm fine.
I thought I saw a thing. [chuckles]
I didn't.
So, first day back at Junior Rescue. You excited?
translation.ja: ジュニア･レスキューの 初日ね　楽しみ？

translation.en: So excited!
I can't wait to see everybody. Gina, Lizzie, Eric.
translation.ja: みんなに会える ジーナ リジー エリック

translation.en: And Tyler?
-I said Tyler. -No, you didn't.
translation.ja: 言った 言ってない

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Well, sure. Him too.
translation.ja: そうね　もちろん彼(かれ)もよ

translation.en: -Not, like, more than everybody else. -[mouths]
translation.ja: 特別ってわけではない

translation.en: You know, the same as everybody else. Like equal to.
translation.ja: みんなと同じ　平等な感じ

translation.en: -Mom, we're just friends. -Okay.
Uh! I can't with you right now.
The International Junior Rescue Championship is this week.
translation.ja: 今週は国際大会がある

translation.en: I have to get to the beach to help set up! [sniffs]
I don't have Tyler for this!
Uh, Dylan?
I heard it.
Roger wants everybody there early. He sent, like, 40 e-mails reminding us. [laughs]
translation.ja: ロジャーが早く集まるよう 40通もメールを

translation.en: As if anybody could forget.
I forgot!
Hey!
I'm sorry!
How could you forget? I sent, like, 40 e-mails!
Nobody my age checks e-mail!
translation.ja: 若者はメールを見ない

translation.en: Look, Junior Rescue doesn't even officially start until next week.
translation.ja: ジュニア･レスキューは 来週からだ

translation.en: Why are we leaving so early?
Hello?
The teams are arriving.
For the Beachmaster?
The international competition we're hosting?
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)たちが主催(しゅさい)する国際大会だ

translation.en: Oh, yeah, right. That's today. I remember seeing that somewhere.
translation.ja: そうだな　どこかで見た

translation.en: It was in the e-mail!
[sighs] Look, I'm not even competing in the thing. Why do I have to be there?
translation.ja: 出場しないのに なぜ俺(おれ)が行く？

translation.en: Just get in.
What's going on?
Dad, you told him to be at the car by 7:00, or you'd leave without him.
translation.ja: ７時までに用意しないと 置いてくのよね

translation.en: How can you expect anyone to respect your authority if your own stepson walks all over you?
translation.ja: 義理の息子の勝手を許したら 威厳(いげん)がなくなる

translation.en: You're right.
This is my first year in charge of Junior Rescue.
translation.ja: ジュニアレスキューを 率いる初日

translation.en: I can't have anyone questioning my leadership. Sorry, Tyler.
translation.ja: 盾(たて)つく奴(やつ)は許さん 悪い

translation.en: [Tyler] How am I supposed to get to Malibu?
Did somebody say Malibu?
Vooch? How did you know I was gonna need a ride?
translation.ja: ヴーチ なぜここに？

translation.en: I'm a bus driver, man. It's what I do!
translation.ja: バスの運転手だからな

translation.en: Eric told me you'd probably oversleep.
translation.ja: 寝坊(ねぼう)すると エリックが言うから

translation.en: So we told Vooch to come get you.
translation.ja: ヴーチと迎(むか)えに来た

translation.en: -Also that. -Is there anyone sweeter than Eric?
translation.ja: まあな エリックは最高だ

translation.en: Wait, where is he?
Art is life!
Life is pain.
This is a doughnut.
Are we supposed to paint the doughnut?
No.
I eat the doughnut.
translation.ja: ドーナツは私が食べる

translation.en: You make art. [chuckles]
Welcome to summer school.
I can do a pretty good Garfield.
Guess I'll just paint that.
The whole school year, I texted Eric during sixth period, which was my free period.
translation.ja: 自由時間に エリックにメールしてた

translation.en: I thought it was his free period too, but it wasn't. That's when he had art.
translation.ja: 美術の時間だったなんて…

translation.en: So instead of leaving her on read, the dummy failed art.
translation.ja: 既読(きどく)スルーしないで落第した

translation.en: Now he has to retake it in summer school.
We gotta get him out of there.
What's our play? Gas the room?
Tranq the teacher? Unleash an army of squirrels?
translation.ja: 先生に麻酔(ますい)矢？ リス軍を放つ？

translation.en: A little peanut butter and an acorn, those fuzzy-tailed rats will do anything you want.
translation.ja: ドングリがあれば 何でもやってくれる

translation.en: Or we just let Eric get an education.
Not on my watch.
Tyler.
Here's that Eric dummy I was telling you about.
Why do you have an Eric dummy?
Oh, I have dummies of all you guys. It's how I take the carpool lane on the weekends.
translation.ja: 全員のダミーがある 交通渋滞(じゅうたい)対策だよ

translation.en: Hey! I was carrying that.
Whoa, whoa! Whoa, whoa whoa! Let me get that from you.
-Hey, I was gonna put that up. -I know.
translation.ja: 私がやってた そうね

translation.en: And you were doing such a good job,
but why don't you let one of the big kids handle it, okay?
translation.ja: でも大きい子に任せよう

translation.en: So, where's Tyler?
Who cares?
Definitely not me. I don't care.
Don't even know why I asked. [laughs]
Oh, look! There's Dirk and Beans!
translation.ja: ダークとビーンズだわ

translation.en: Get that grill fired up, boys. [chuckles]
Okay.
Oh, where are they?
Why is everybody so worried about where Tyler and his dumb friends are?
translation.ja: なぜみんなタイラーたちの 心配してるの？

translation.en: What? No, not Tyler. I'm talking about Team USA.
translation.ja: タイラーじゃない 米国(アメリカ)チームだ

translation.en: Tyler and his friends can't handle the Beachmaster. There's too much riding on it.
translation.ja: タイラーたちに ビーチマスターはムリ

translation.en: International teams are gonna be here any minute. We cannot be late to our own welcome barbecue.
translation.ja: 各国のチームが来る 歓迎(かんげい)会に遅刻(ちこく)できない

translation.en: Dad, is Junior Junior Rescue really a thing?
translation.ja: ジュニア･ジュニア･ レスキューって本当？

translation.en: Or did you not want to pay for camp while Mom and Jake were out of town?
translation.ja: 私のサマーキャンプ代を ケチった？

translation.en: 'Cause nobody's letting me do anything.
translation.ja: 何もさせてもらえない

translation.en: Well, I mean...
No, it's not. But when you think about it, it could be.
translation.ja: 違(ちが)うよ でも いい考えかもな

translation.en: Oh, finally. Ha ha ha! It's Team USA!
translation.ja: 来たぞ 米国チームだ

translation.en: Dang! That Jeep is on-brand.
[through bullhorn] What's up?
Hey, Grandma, move it! That spot is for Team USA!
translation.ja: おばあさん どいて 米国チームの場所だぞ

translation.en: Spence, would you honk at her?
Don't honk at her.
Spence, so help me, if you don't get honking!
translation.ja: どなられたくなければ やれ

translation.en: Don't do it.
Yo, are we jerks, or are we good guys?
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)たちは悪い奴(やつ) いい奴(やつ)？

translation.en: 'Cause I'm getting really mixed signals here.
Those guys have won the Beachmaster four years in a row.
translation.ja: ビーチマスターで４連続優勝

translation.en: No one's ever won it five. And when we do, [laughs] we can kiss all our troubles goodbye!
translation.ja: 前人未到の５連覇(れんぱ)できれば 問題ともおさらばだ

translation.en: -What troubles? -What troubles? Who said troubles?
translation.ja: 問題？ 問題なんて俺(おれ)は言ってない

translation.en: I didn't say troubles. You did. Look, all I'm trying to say is,
translation.ja: 問題なんて俺(おれ)は言ってない ブロディ スペンサー プレスリー イジー チューチ

translation.en: with Brody, Spencer, Presley, Izzy, and the Chooch, we got this on lock.
translation.ja: ブロディ スペンサー プレスリー イジー チューチ 最強チームだ

translation.en: Didn't the Chooch graduate high school, like, three years ago?
translation.ja: ３年前に高校卒業した チューチ？

translation.en: Four, actually.
You are the vessels. Let your muse guide your hands.
translation.ja: あなたは船 魂(たましい)に手をゆだねて

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, Eric.
translation.ja: まあ エリック　いいわよ

translation.en: Yes, that's it. Release your art.
translation.ja: まあ エリック　いいわよ 自分を解き放って

translation.en: Release it. Everyone release.
translation.ja: 解き放つ みんなもよ

translation.en: I don't think you're releasing. Let the paint flow. [laughs]
translation.ja: まだ足りない もっと解き放つのよ

translation.en: [Eric] I totally thought I was gonna miss seeing the Beachmaster.
translation.ja: ビーチマスターには 行けないと思ってた

translation.en: Thanks for busting me out of summer school, you guys.
translation.ja: 助けてくれてありがと

translation.en: It's so great to see you!
Did you get a haircut? -It looks amazing. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: 髪(かみ) 切った？　最高だよ

translation.en: -Well-- -[Tyler] Really?
I just went in for a trim, and I was afraid my guy took too much off, but you saying that really makes me feel--
translation.ja: 切り過ぎだと思ってたけど 君がそう言うなら…

translation.en: Um, I think he was talking to me. [chuckles]
But your hair looks great, too.
Thanks, man!
One year later, and you two are exactly the same dorks you were when you left each other.
translation.ja: １年 経(た)っても ２人は全然 変わってない

translation.en: [Eric and Tyler] Yeah, we are!
♪ Whoa, oh, oh, oh-oh ♪
This coleslaw expired the year I was born!
translation.ja: 私が生まれた年の コールスローよ

translation.en: We cannot serve this.
-[bus horn plays "Pop! Goes the Weasel"] -[gasps] They're here!
You guys!
-Hi. -[Lizzie] Hey, Dylan.
Come here.
Okay, I'm calling it. This hug's done.
[Vooch] There she is.
There was definitely something between us last year.
translation.ja: 去年 何かがあった

translation.en: But what if it's gone?
What if I'm too late?
Vooch, do you mind?
Just saying what everybody's thinking, man.
translation.ja: みんなが思ってることだ

translation.en: [laughing] Okay, bye.
Hey.
Hi.
-[horn honking] -Look alive, people!
It's showtime.
[Roger laughing] Yeah! Yes!
Hello!
Hola.
Bonjour.
Shalom.
[Australian accent] G'day, mates.
Am I saying that right? "Mates"?
-Uh... -[Roger chuckles] Okay.
Those are the best Junior Rescuers in the world? They don't seem so great.
translation.ja: あれが大会の選手？ 大したことない

translation.en: [Roger] Hey, superhero.
That was pretty great.
Pssh, whatever. I do stuff like that all the time.
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)はいつもやってる

translation.en: [Dylan] That's Team Australia.
They're, like, Team USA's biggest rival.
translation.ja: 米国チームの最大のライバル

translation.en: This is so exciting. We can learn from them, train with them...
translation.ja: 最高ね　彼(かれ)らから学んで 一緒(いっしょ)に訓練…

translation.en: -[sizzling] -...and apparently, make lunch for them.
translation.ja: 彼(かれ)らの昼食を作る

translation.en: This is humiliating.
[Tyler] I know, right?
-[sizzling] -I got a man down here!
Pulling a burger out of the coals isn't the kind of rescuing I thought we'd be doing this summer.
translation.ja: 炭から肉を救う仕事だとは 思わなかった

translation.en: -[applause, PA feedback] -Thank you. Thank you.
Welcome to the 2020 International Beachmaster competition!
translation.ja: 国際ビーチマスター大会へ ようこそ

translation.en: You are the most elite Junior Rescue teams in the world,
translation.ja: 世界最高のジュニア･ レスキューチームだ

translation.en: and we are thrilled to have you here in beautiful Malibu!
translation.ja: 美しいマリブビーチへ ようこそ

translation.en: Please, please.
Our sand is your sand.
Our seas are your seas.
Train, enjoy, and this Friday, may the best team win!
translation.ja: 訓練して楽しんで 金曜日に優勝者を決める

translation.en: -[all cheering] -He's talking about us!
-Let's go! [grunts] -Whoo! Yeah!
I can't believe we have to serve food while Brody gets to strut around like big, dumb...
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)らは働いてるのに ブロディときたら―

translation.en: Brody.
I don't know why those guys get to be Team USA.
translation.ja: なぜ彼(かれ)らが米国チーム？

translation.en: We saved the beach last year.
translation.ja: 去年 俺(おれ)らが活躍(かつやく)した

translation.en: Just 'cause they're from Malibu, they're automatically better than us?
We could've been Team USA. Why didn't Roger give us a chance to try out?
translation.ja: 選考があれば 俺(おれ)らが代表になれた

translation.en: What's that, Valley?
You think you can be Team USA, huh? I got two words for that.
translation.ja: 代表になれると？ １つ言わせろ

translation.en: Chyeah. You wish.
We're the Dream Team, man. We've won this thing four years in a row.
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)たちは夢のチーム ４連覇(れんぱ)してる

translation.en: One more and we will have the longest winning streak in Beachmaster history.
translation.ja: もう１勝すれば 史上最長の記録になる

translation.en: The longest streak you've ever had was in your shorts.
translation.ja: お前の記録はパンツの中

translation.en: [laughs] Spence?
Hey-- Hey, Spence!
Guess what I said about Tyler's shorts.
[laughs] You're gonna love it.
Well, that guy's a real drongo, mate.
Yeah, he is.
Unless that means "cool guy," in which case, he is not.
translation.ja: “イケてる”って 意味でなければ

translation.en: Yeah. No, it's, uh, Aussie for "idiot."
translation.ja: オーストラリアで “バカ”って意味

translation.en: Well, then, yes, he is a major drongo.
Hey, I'm Tyler.
Wayno. Cheers for the burger, brother. Catch you around, yeah?
translation.ja: ワイノだ　バーガーありがと またな

translation.en: Well, he seemed nice.
[Brody] Hey, Valley!
Don't forget to toast my buns!
I said toast my buns!
[groans] I'm out of slaw here.
Fret not. Eric to the rescue!
translation.ja: 任せて 僕(ぼく)が取ってくる

translation.en: I can get it.
No, Eric. Not that one.
That one's rotten. I'll get a new one.
translation.ja: 腐(くさ)ってる　私が取ってくる

translation.en: [Brody] USA! USA! USA!
translation.ja: 米国　米国　米国！

translation.en: Is hungry!
[laughing] In his shorts!
Here you go, Brody. Gave you a little extra coleslaw.
translation.ja: おまけのコールスローだ

translation.en: Ssh! Don't tell anybody.
Oh, my God.
This slaw...
...is amazing!
-Spencer, try this! -Wait. No, no. Wait, wait.
translation.ja: 食ってみろ 待って

translation.en: [Brody] Eat up.
-Yo, this slaw is legit! -Yeah.
It's like it's creamy, but it burns.
translation.ja: まろやかで刺激(しげき)がある

translation.en: No, Presley!
translation.ja: やめろ プレスリー

translation.en: Weird. It's like I hate it, but I also can't stop eating it!
translation.ja: 変ね きらいだけど やめられない感じ

translation.en: [Tyler] Uh, guys-- Uh, guys, seriously!
-[Brody] Wait, wait! -[Tyler] Come on!
It makes my teeth sting.
[Brody] Hey. Easy, buddy.
-What do you think you're doing? -I think I overcooked this burger.
translation.ja: 何だよ バーガーを焼き過ぎた 取り替える

translation.en: -Here, let me get you a new one. -Hey! Bring back more of that funky slaw.
translation.ja: バーガーを焼き過ぎた 取り替える お代わりをくれ チューチに食われた

translation.en: The Chooch just finished mine.
translation.ja: お代わりをくれ チューチに食われた

translation.en: [grunts] Good thing we got a new one.
Could you imagine if somebody actually ate that stuff?
translation.ja: 誰(だれ)かがあれを食べたら大変

translation.en: Oh, no!
[crying] I'm sorry!
Oh, man, this is not good.
Wait, wait, wait. Don't take me away. Don't take me away. I'm feeling a little bit better. [farts]
translation.ja: 待ってくれ 少しよくなってきた

translation.en: [grunts] Oh, take me away! Take me away!
-This is a nightmare. -[siren chirping]
[Tyler] Roger, it-- It's gonna be okay.
translation.ja: ロジャー 大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)だよ

translation.en: Look, I'm sure they'll be feeling better by tomorrow.
The paramedic says it's the worst case of food poisoning she's ever seen.
translation.ja: こんな食中毒 見たことないって

translation.en: They want us to seal those port-a-potties in cement and bury them in the desert.
translation.ja: 仮設トイレを 砂漠(さばく)に埋(う)めるべきって

translation.en: Okay, Lizzie, we get it! They're sick. Do we have to keep talking about it?
translation.ja: 重症(じゅうしょう)だと分かった もういいだろ

translation.en: It's just a lot of potty talk, and I think that we're better than that, that's all.
translation.ja: トイレの話ばかり しなくてもいいだろ

translation.en: Well, that's that.
What's what?
No Team USA means no win.
No win means no streak. And no streak means no world record.
translation.ja: 世界記録もないといういこと

translation.en: I think we all know what that means.
Uh, no, we don't.
Look, I didn't wanna have to tell you guys this, but...
we don't have enough kids signed up for Junior Rescue next week.
translation.ja: ジュニア･レスキューの 志願者が少ない

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
Parents weren't lining up to send their kids to the beach after that tower blew up last year.
translation.ja: 去年の爆発(ばくはつ)事件以来 親が 子供を行かせたがらない

translation.en: But, like, no towers have blown up since then.
translation.ja: あれから爆発(ばくはつ)してない

translation.en: Yeah, they don't exactly reward you for towers that don't blow up. They just penalize you for the ones that do.
translation.ja: １回の爆発(ばくはつ)で 人からの評価は決まる

translation.en: If we won for a fifth time,
we would officially be the greatest Junior Rescue team in the world!
translation.ja: 世界で最高のチームだと 認められる

translation.en: We'd have the trophies to prove it!
translation.ja: トロフィーが証(あか)しに

translation.en: Nobody would care about what happened last summer.
Ah! A record-breaking win by Team USA was exactly the thing we needed
translation.ja: 米国チームが新記録で 優勝すれば

translation.en: to inspire a new generation of Junior Rescuers to sign up.
translation.ja: 志願者が増えたはずなのに

translation.en: Well, how many kids do we have?
Three.
Three? That's it?
Quit rubbing it in!
I can tell a bunch of my friends to sign up. I wield a lot of power in my friend group.
translation.ja: 友達に声をかける みんな 言いなりよ

translation.en: Sasha, ten more little kids isn't gonna solve this problem.
translation.ja: 小さい子が 10人 来てもダメだ

translation.en: Why don't you just let us worry about that?
translation.ja: お兄さんたちが考える

translation.en: Without Team USA's big win, I don't see how we're gonna get more recruits.
translation.ja: 優勝できなければ 人が集まらない

translation.en: No more recruits means no more Junior Rescue.
translation.ja: 人が集まらなければ 存続できない

translation.en: I'm sorry, guys, but after Friday, we'll have no choice but to shut the program down.
translation.ja: 金曜日が終わったら 解散するしかない

translation.en: What are you looking at?
-Jeffy! Did you find my great big hat? -[music stops]
translation.ja: ジェフィー 私の帽子(ぼうし) 見つけた？

translation.en: Oh! You found it.
Who is my best little boy?
translation.ja: 自慢(じまん)の息子は誰(だれ)？

translation.en: You are. You're my best little boy. Come here.
translation.ja: あなたよ　いい子だわ

translation.en: Oh, my gosh! Oh! Oh!
We can't just let this happen.
What are we supposed to do?
We'll be Team USA.
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)らが代表になる

translation.en: Tyler.
We can't just be Team USA. We're not ready.
translation.ja: 準備もしてないのにムリよ

translation.en: Tyler, are you serious?
Yes.
Look, we can't let Junior Rescue go without a fight.
translation.ja: 戦わずに解散なんてイヤだ

translation.en: We're as good as Brody and those other guys.
Besides, how hard could it be?
That's the Beachmaster?
translation.ja: これがビーチマスター？

translation.en: It is called the Beachmaster. Did you think it was gonna be easy?
translation.ja: ビーチマスターよ 簡単だと思った？

translation.en: I was hoping!
Kind of wishin' I was in summer school right now.
translation.ja: 補講に戻(もど)りたい気分だ

translation.en: Guys, this isn't The Crucible.
The Beachmaster pushes you to your limits. Limits you didn't even know you had.
translation.ja: ビーチマスターは限界まで 追い込む

translation.en: Okay, Brody and his team have been training all year,
translation.ja: ブロディたちは訓練してた

translation.en: and we have until Friday. That's, like, four days!
translation.ja: 私たちは金曜まで たったの４日よ

translation.en: If we don't do anything, Junior Rescue dies. We have to try.
translation.ja: とにかくやってみよう

translation.en: Look, Dylan, you're with me, right?
translation.ja: ディランも一緒(いっしょ)だろ

translation.en: [laughs] With you? Like, um-- Like with you, with you?
translation.ja: 一緒(いっしょ)って… あなたと？

translation.en: Yeah. Wait, no. Uh, wait. What did you mean?
translation.ja: ああ　いや どういう意味？

translation.en: What did you mean?
-Nothing, forget it! -Nothing, forget it!
I can get us ready in four days.
translation.ja: 私なら４日で準備できる

translation.en: My dad's a retired drill sergeant. My entire life has been one big boot camp.
translation.ja: 父は軍の訓練係で ずっと訓練を受けてきた

translation.en: I can kill 30 different ways with my thumb.
translation.ja: 親指で人を殺す方法は 30通り

translation.en: Ooh! I wanna learn that.
We just need somebody to train us for the Beachmaster.
translation.ja: 必要なのは ビーチマスターの訓練

translation.en: I can do that.
We're Tower Two. We saved Junior Rescue last summer, and we can do it again this year.
translation.ja: 私たちはタワー２ 今年もピンチを救える

translation.en: I can have us ready to win by Friday.
translation.ja: 金曜までに準備できる

translation.en: All right, Gina, we're all yours.
Just tell us what to do.
[whistles] All right, you maggots, your butts belong to me!
translation.ja: お前らのケツは私が預かる

translation.en: From here on out, you talk when I say you talk and rest when I say you rest!
translation.ja: これからは私の指図に従って

translation.en: Get a good night's sleep 'cause hell begins tomorrow.
translation.ja: よく眠れ　明日から地獄(じごく)だ

translation.en: Wow, that whistle really went to her head. [whistle blares]
Eric, what are you doing here so early?
translation.ja: エリック 朝から何してるの？

translation.en: You're right. You know what? You're right. I shouldn't interrupt.
translation.ja: そうよね 邪魔(じゃま)しちゃダメね

translation.en: You know, I just have to say,
I find your dedication inspiring, you know?
translation.ja: その熱心さは すばらしいと 思うわ

translation.en: Reminds me of my semester abroad in Paris.
translation.ja: パリで過ごした時のことを 思い出す

translation.en: -[accordion music playing] -Oh, I learned so much that year.
About life, about laughter. [chuckles]
About love.
Gina said to be here at 6:30.
Where is she?
Maybe she overslept?
You wanna know why that just happened? Because you weren't ready!
translation.ja: 油断するから こうなる

translation.en: All the teams we're about to face this week have one thing in common.
translation.ja: 対戦相手には １つ共通点がある

translation.en: They were actually chosen to compete?
Well, yeah.
-They've been training for months? -Yeah, that too.
translation.ja: 訓練してる？ そうね

translation.en: They're the pride of their countries, and we're a bunch of underdogs nobody believes in?
translation.ja: 彼(かれ)らは国の誇(ほこ)り 私たちは負け犬

translation.en: I was gonna say they're ready for anything.
translation.ja: 彼(かれ)らは何にでも 準備ができてる

translation.en: The Beachmaster is a grueling obstacle course designed to put lifeguarding's most important skills to the test:
translation.ja: 厳しい障害物のあるコースで ライフガードの技を試す

translation.en: strength, endurance, agility, and, most importantly, teamwork.
translation.ja: 強さ 忍耐(にんたい)力 素早さ 一番大事なのはチームワーク

translation.en: The team that gets through the course the fastest, wins. The whole team.
translation.ja: 一番 速いチームが勝つ チーム競技よ

translation.en: That means we have to work together.
No problem. We're Tower Two. Teamwork is our jam.
translation.ja: チームワークは得意だ

translation.en: Good. Then this should be easy.
Now move your butts! We've got work to do!
-[whistle blares] -[Lizzie] Ooh! Oh, sorry!
-[Tyler] Let's go! -[Gina] Really?
[Dylan] Let's move away from here. Head that way. Okay.
Yeah, come on! Let's go, Dylan!
translation.ja: さあ 早く ディラン

translation.en: Whoo! Come on! You got this! Move those legs! Let's go! Yeah!
translation.ja: 足を動かして　急いで！

translation.en: After you.
-Eric, what are you doing? -Holding the wire for my lady.
translation.ja: 何してる？ 押(お)さえてる

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't know you two were out on a date.
translation.ja: デート中だとは知らなかった

translation.en: I thought we were training for the most important competition of our lives!
translation.ja: 重要な大会の訓練中でしょ！

translation.en: -Move it! Move it! -[whistle blares]
Let's go! Come on!
Keep it up! Let's go!
Go! Whoo!
-[Tyler] Oh, come on, guys! -[Lizzie] I got it! I got it!
Come on, guys! Teamwork makes the dream work!
translation.ja: チームワークで夢をかなえろ

translation.en: Let's go, you maggots! Go! Go! Go!
Come on! Go, slowpoke!
translation.ja: さっさと登れ のろま！

translation.en: Come on, Eric! Let's go! Let's go! You've got this! Come on! Let's move it!
translation.ja: エリック 早く！ いけるよ　早く

translation.en: -[Tyler] You got this, Dylan. -[Gina] Good job, Tyler! Come on! Come on!
translation.ja: がんばれ タイラー いいわよ

translation.en: I got you.
translation.ja: 大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)だ

translation.en: -More training, less flirting! -Uh...
-Sick teamwork, bro. -Nice save, dog!
translation.ja: よかった ありがと

translation.en: Oops! Sorry!
All you have to do is get across this line.
translation.ja: この線を越(こ)えればいい

translation.en: -That's it? -[Gina] Yep.
This feels like a trap.
If it's a trap, don't worry. I'll protect you.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)が守ってあげる

translation.en: I can protect myself.
Guys, it's not a trap!
Then why am I holding a riot shield?
translation.ja: なぜ盾(たて)を持たせるの

translation.en: Because it is a trap!
translation.ja: なぜなら ワナだから

translation.en: Everybody get behind me!
[Lizzie] Come on, Dylan! A couple of more steps! Come on!
Now push! We're almost there!
translation.ja: 押(お)して もう少し

translation.en: That's it! Great teamwork!
-[Dylan] God. -[Lizzie] Push! You got it!
translation.ja: ヤダ 体を押(お)して

translation.en: Push!
I told you to be prepared for anything!
translation.ja: どんな事態にも備えて

translation.en: You guys, help me with this thing!
[Tyler] We gotta grab it! Okay.
[Dylan] I can't get it.
You guys distract it, and I'll sneak up behind it!
translation.ja: 気をそらせ　後ろに回る

translation.en: You can't distract it! It's a hose, you moron!
translation.ja: ホースの気はそらせない バカ！

translation.en: [Dylan] A little this way.
-[Lizzie] Hey! -[Tyler] A little closer.
[Dylan] I can't.
-Grab it! Somebody grab it! -[Gina] I got it! I got it!
translation.ja: 誰(だれ)か つかまえて つかまえた

translation.en: Don't worry. I got it.
Hey, settle down, sunshine.
This is a job for a big fella, not a little wallaby like you.
translation.ja: お兄さんの仕事 小さい君にはムリ

translation.en: We did it!
Yes! We killed it!
Uh, guys?
Everybody okay?
Yeah, we're just doing a little training.
Ah. Sorry.
Do you, uh, want me to turn it back on, do ya?
[all] No!
Look, we're kind of wrapping it up, anyway.
-You guys all right? -Depends. How much of that did you see?
translation.ja: 平気？ どれくらい見た？

translation.en: All of it, mate.
Well, then, we've been better.
I'm Eric!
Oh! I'm Kezza.
And that's Johnno, Shaz, Carli, and that's Wayno.
translation.ja: ジョノ シャズ カーリ ワイノよ

translation.en: So, you guys are the new Team USA?
translation.ja: 君らが新しい米国チーム？

translation.en: Looks like we got some stiff competition, boys?
translation.ja: 厳しい戦いになりそうだ

translation.en: Don't worry. We'll be ready by Friday.
Oh, of course you will be.
You guys are doing a ripper job out there, right, Wayno?
translation.ja: すごい活躍(かつやく)してた

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
Just messing with you, mate.
Hey...
you forgot your wrench.
Yeah, it must have been cracked or something.
You guys are in trouble.
Would you get out of here?
Oh, she's right. We are in trouble.
He's been going nonstop for three days. [chuckles] Oh, gosh. Eh!
translation.ja: ３日間 休んでない まあ

translation.en: Everyone stay on this side of his canvas.
translation.ja: みんな キャンバスの こちら側に

translation.en: Do not interrupt him.
Come on! Pick it up!
Eric, what are you doing?
-Keeping you company. -You don't have to.
translation.ja: 一緒(いっしょ)に走ろう いいのに

translation.en: I know. I want to.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)が一緒(いっしょ)にいたい

translation.en: Let's go!
Morning, brother.
Going for a little walkey-walkey, are we?
Wish I didn't see that.
I can dig some holes where the other teams will be running.
translation.ja: 穴を掘(ほ)ってあげようか

translation.en: A few broken ankles would really even the odds.
translation.ja: 相手が骨折したら勝てるかも

translation.en: That's sweet, honey, but I think it'd be best if you just stayed out of the way.
translation.ja: ありがたいけど 何もしない方がいい

translation.en: Nobody will let me do anything.
Why do you keep making me come to Junior Rescue?
translation.ja: なぜここに連れてくるの？

translation.en: Oh, don't worry.
If things keep going the way they're going, there won't be a Junior Rescue to come back to.
translation.ja: このままだとジュニア･ レスキューがなくなる

translation.en: [woman shouts] Jeffy!
Where are you?
You seen my great big meatball sandwich?
translation.ja: ミートボールサンドは？

translation.en: -[woman] Jeffy! -[record scratches, music stops]
Where are you?
[Gina] Listen up!
The trick with the cargo net is to move opposing limbs in unison
translation.ja: ネットでは 手足を一緒(いっしょ)に動かして

translation.en: and stick as close as you can to the support beams.
translation.ja: 支柱の近くで移動する

translation.en: Lizzie, you're up first.
And try not to make me puke.
Come on, Lizzie, move it! Move it!
-[Lizzie grunts] -Uh, I-- I got you!
No, Eric! Let her do it!
translation.ja: エリック 助けないで

translation.en: -[grunts] I had it! -I know.
-Then why did you come up here? -I-- I just want to be here for you.
translation.ja: なぜ来たの 君のためだよ

translation.en: Tyler, Dylan. Get in there and show 'em how it's done.
translation.ja: タイラー ディラン お手本を

translation.en: -Like together? -We're not together.
translation.ja: 一緒(いっしょ)に？ 違(ちが)うわ

translation.en: -I know that. -What's going on with you two?
translation.ja: そうだ どうしたの？

translation.en: Nothing, let's just go.
[Lizzie] Ow! Oh! A lot of movement over there. Ow!
Okay! Okay!
That's Tyler's leg.
Who put this thing--
Ah! Getting a little light-headed!
This went wrong so fast.
[woman] Help!
Hey! Somebody needs our help!
-[woman] Help! -[man] Hey!
-[man] Come on! -[woman] Hey!
We're on it!
-Gina, a little help here? -We have to save them! Come on!
translation.ja: 手を貸して 助けないと

translation.en: [Wayno] Aussies on this one.
Johnno and Carli, you take the one on the left!
translation.ja: ジョノとカーリは左側

translation.en: [Kezza] All right, let's go. Now. Shaz and Johnno, in the water now.
translation.ja: シャズとジョノ 中へ

translation.en: [Wayno] Let's go. Come on, team. You got it.
Watch out for the rips.
[Wayno] Let's go, team. Come on.
Hey! I said we're on it.
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)が助けるはずだ

translation.en: [Wayno] Let's go, team. Come on.
Let's go. You're doing' great. Bring 'em in.
Okay, bring 'em up. Come on.
[Tyler] Come on!
All right, yeah. That was amazing, Shaz. Good work.
translation.ja: がんばったわ シャズ

translation.en: -Good stuff, team. -That was amazing.
translation.ja: いいぞ すばらしい

translation.en: Is everybody okay?
Oh, yeah. No worries, mate.
We just saw that youse were a bit busy with your net over there, so we jumped in.
translation.ja: ネットで困ってたから 助けに入った

translation.en: We didn't mean to show you up or nothing.
-You didn't show us up. -Oh, you reckon, do ya?
translation.ja: そうだよな そう思う？

translation.en: We're the ones who saved those shark biscuits while you were flopping around like a mudskipper going walkabout.
translation.ja: 君たちがドタバタしてる間に 俺(おれ)たちは人命救助

translation.en: I can't tell. Are you guys nice people, or are you not nice people?
translation.ja: いい人なのかイヤな奴(やつ)なのか 分からない

translation.en: Yeah, I thought we kind of bonded over the whole "Brody's a drongo" thing.
translation.ja: ブロディの“ドロンゴ”で 団結しただろ

translation.en: Yeah, look, that's when he was the drongo.
translation.ja: 彼(かれ)が“ドロンゴ”だったから

translation.en: Now you're the drongo, drongo.
I'm coming down on "not nice."
We came here... with one mission...
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)たちが ここに来た理由は１つ

translation.en: To destroy Team USA.
I just didn't think it was gonna be this easy, eh?
translation.ja: こんなに簡単だとは意外だ

translation.en: Good bit of luck with the real team getting sick like that?
translation.ja: 本物のチームが病気とはね

translation.en: I know what the problem is.
I've been way too easy on you!
I wouldn't say that.
Tomorrow, I drop the hammer!
Don't worry. We'll get through this together.
translation.ja: 大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)　一緒(いっしょ)にやろう

translation.en: Oh, what? 'Cause I can't do it by myself?
translation.ja: 私が１人でできないから？

translation.en: I didn't mean...
Man, none of this would be happening if Brody and his team hadn't gotten sick.
translation.ja: ブロディたちが 病気になったせいだ

translation.en: Okay, well, they did, okay?
I don't know why you're yelling at me about it!
translation.ja: なぜ俺(おれ)に文句 言う？

translation.en: I didn't mean...
What's wrong with Tyler?
How would I know?
It's not like I sit around thinking about Tyler all the time!
translation.ja: タイラーのことばかり 考えてない

translation.en: My head's in the game! [grunts]
I didn't mean...
Actually, I don't know what I meant.
Ho! Excuse me.
I didn't realize there was anyone else in the building.
translation.ja: 誰(だれ)かいるとは思わなかった

translation.en: I, too, do my best work after hours.
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)も仕事のあとに やってることがある

translation.en: I'm in a band.
If you don't mind, I'll give you one of my CDs.
You could listen to it,
translation.ja: 聞いてみて意見をくれ

translation.en: maybe give me a little feedback, one artist to another.
translation.ja: 聞いてみて意見をくれ 同じアーティストとして

translation.en: I've got my, uh, e-mail on the back,
translation.ja: 後ろにメールアドレスがある

translation.en: and my Twitter handle. Or you could just hit me up on LinkedIn.
translation.ja: ツイッターでも リンクトインでもいい

translation.en: I'd love to make you part of my network.
translation.ja: ぜひ君とつながりたい

translation.en: I'll just leave this here.
I really like that guy.
Quiet, good listener.
translation.ja: 静かで いい聞き手だ

translation.en: Right.
How ya doing, Gina?
If you're here to trash-talk my team, don't. I'm not in the mood.
translation.ja: チームを バカにするつもりならやめて

translation.en: Oh, no, I'm not here to trash-talk your team.
We're all Junior Rescue. We gotta stick together. It doesn't matter where we come from.
translation.ja: 同じジュニア･レスキューよ 出身地は関係ない

translation.en: I'm actually here to give you a little pep talk.
translation.ja: 私は激励(げきれい)に来たのよ

translation.en: And why would you do that?
Um, because if you go into competition as bad as you are,
translation.ja: その実力で大会に出たら

translation.en: we're gonna look like huge jerks when we kick your bums.
translation.ja: 私たちがいじめっ子みたい

translation.en: People will be like, "Oh, why'd you humiliate those Yanks?"
translation.ja: “なぜそこまでやる？”と 思われる

translation.en: We'll be like, "We didn't mean to. It's not our fault they're incompetent."
translation.ja: “なぜそこまでやる？”と 思われる でも私たちは悪くない

translation.en: They'll be like, "Too right. They're a bunch of bogans."
And I'll be like, "Hey, hey, hey. Lay off 'em, cause those bogans are our mates."
translation.ja: 私は言う “やめて 彼らは友達なの”

translation.en: We've just had a couple off days. We're gonna win this thing.
translation.ja: あの訓練はお遊びよ 私たちが勝つ

translation.en: Oh, yes. See, look, that's the spirit.
translation.ja: そうね その意気よ

translation.en: And don't even worry about the fact that you're representing your entire country
translation.ja: 自分が国の代表だとか―

translation.en: or that tomorrow you're gonna completely humiliate yourself
translation.ja: 明日 恥(はじ)をさらすかもとか 心配しないで

translation.en: -in front of the world. -You're trying to get in my head.
translation.ja: 明日 恥(はじ)をさらすかもとか 心配しないで ビビらせたい？

translation.en: Oh, no, I'm not trying to get in your head. [laughs]
I'm already in there.
And you? [laughs] You don't stand a chance.
translation.ja: あなたには可能性がない

translation.en: Catch you later.
Is it me, or is she even scarier when she's not yelling?
translation.ja: どなってない方が 怖(こわ)くない？

translation.en: She's "Mom mad." That's the maddest you can be.
translation.ja: “キレママ” 超(ちょう)キレてるってこと

translation.en: Do you want to lose tomorrow?
Speaking for me and Lizzie?
-No. -Eric, I can speak for myself.
-No. -'Cause it feels like you wanna lose.
I've been racking my brain trying to figure out how you could possibly be this bad,
translation.ja: なぜこんなにダメなのか ずっと考えてた

translation.en: and all I could come up with is that you hate Junior Rescue.
translation.ja: ジュニア･レスキューが きらいなのね

translation.en: Well, you need to reexamine your conclusions, because we love Junior Rescue.
translation.ja: それは違(ちが)う　私たちは ジュニア･レスキューが好き

translation.en: Well, you're not training like you love it. You're training like a bunch of bogans.
translation.ja: そうは感じない まるで とんまよ

translation.en: What's a bogan?
It's what you're training like!
You're distracted, and your teamwork sucks.
translation.ja: 集中せず チームワークも最低

translation.en: We've got one more day to get ready.
But you have to want it.
All of you. Do you want to win?
Of course we do.
Then what's the problem?
They're way better than us.
translation.ja: 彼(かれ)らがすごすぎる

translation.en: You're trying to steal our secrets, are ya?
translation.ja: 技を盗(ぬす)むつもりか？

translation.en: I mean, you can if you want.
translation.ja: できるなら どうぞ

translation.en: You still don't have a prayer. Ha ha!
You see that? That thing I just did.
That was sweet as, right?
Let's see what you got, Team Drongo.
translation.ja: ドロンゴチームはどうだ？

translation.en: -That was awesome, mate. So sick. -That was good, right?
translation.ja: いいぞ！ すごいだろ

translation.en: [sighs] Four days isn't enough time.
I thought I could get us ready, but I was wrong.
translation.ja: 準備できると思ったけど

translation.en: I'm sorry I let you down.
No, we let you down.
translation.ja: 私たちが がっかりさせた

translation.en: Yeah. We could have trained harder.
translation.ja: もっとがんばれたはず

translation.en: I mean, every time I try to sit, I go, "Ow."
translation.ja: 座るたびに“あー”って 言ってた

translation.en: I think I could've given a little more.
Gina, we weren't even supposed to be doing this. If Brody and the guys hadn't got sick--
translation.ja: 予定外の出場だもの ブロディが…

translation.en: Okay, fine! It's my fault! Is that what you wanted me to say?
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)のせいだ そう言わせたいのか？

translation.en: Dude, what did you do?
Brody was strutting around at the barbecue bragging that he was Team USA,
translation.ja: バーベキューで ブロディが自慢(じまん)してたから

translation.en: and we weren't. So I pulled a prank on him.
translation.ja: バーベキューで ブロディが自慢(じまん)してたから いたずらした

translation.en: I gave him that rotten coleslaw.
translation.ja: 腐(くさ)ったコールスローを

translation.en: Tyler, why would you do that?
I didn't know everybody else was gonna eat it. And I definitely didn't know they were gonna get sick.
translation.ja: 他の人が食べることも 病気になることも想定外だ

translation.en: That coleslaw was 17 years old, man. What'd you think was gonna happen?
translation.ja: あのコールスローは17歳だ 想像つくだろ？

translation.en: I wasn't thinking, okay?
This whole year I was so excited to come back to Junior Rescue.
translation.ja: ジュニア･レスキューに 戻(もど)るのを楽しみにしてたが

translation.en: Now there might not even be a Junior Rescue.
Because of me.
Where do you think you're going, soldier? Hey, you get back here!
translation.ja: どこ行くの？　戻(もど)ってきて

translation.en: That's an order!
[sighs] Can you believe him?
I bet we would have had a shot at this thing if the Aussies hadn't gotten in our heads.
translation.ja: 敵に惑(まど)わされなければ 善戦できたはず

translation.en: I wish they would get food poisoning.
translation.ja: 彼(かれ)らが食中毒になればいい

translation.en: I don't actually mean that. I'm just having a lot of feelings now.
translation.ja: 本気じゃない 複雑な気分なの

translation.en: Give it a rest, kid.
[woman] Jeffy! You seen my radio?
translation.ja: ジェフィー ラジオは？

translation.en: -[music clicks off] -[woman] Jeffy!
Hey! Get back here! What are you-- Ow! Ow!
God! Stubbed my big toe on this giant heart made out of rocks!
translation.ja: 大きな石のハートに 足をぶつけた

translation.en: Jeffy, did you put this here? Is this you?
Hey, get back here! Jeffy!
[Brody] Mom!
I'm all out of juice!
Mom!
Hey, you're not my mom!
What are you doing in my room?
Just wanted to stop by, see how you're doing.
translation.ja: どんな調子か見に来た

translation.en: My tummy's still a little bit rumbly, but...
translation.ja: おなかはゴロゴロするが―

translation.en: I guess I feel a bit better.
Well, that's great. That's great news.
You and the team can still get out and win this thing. Come on, man.
translation.ja: じゃあ大会に出られるな

translation.en: What are you, crazy?
I haven't eaten solid food in four days. I can't stand up without getting dizzy,
translation.ja: ４日間 食事してない 立ちくらみするし

translation.en: and my doctor says I have the butthole of a 65-year-old man!
translation.ja: 医者は65歳の肛門(こうもん)だと 言ってる

translation.en: Look, there's something I gotta tell you.
I knew that coleslaw was expired.
translation.ja: コールスローは腐(くさ)ってた

translation.en: But for the record, you were supposed to spit it out.

translation.en: What do you mean nobody got hurt?

Wait, so we lost, but we won?
That's classic us right there.

Okay, Eric, it's time.
Show us your work.
Eric?
Eric!

translation.en: Neat! See ya!
♪ Na-na-na-na-na na-na na-na Na-na-na-na ♪

Malibu Rescue's newest finest. Come on out, kids.

translation.en: -♪ Na-na-na-na-na ♪ -♪ Steady, bet... ♪
That looks freaking scary!
I wanna learn that. [giggles]

I mean, not The Crucible.
Mom, I just had the weirdest dream.

translation.en: -[Mother] What was it, sweetie? -[screams]
[laughing] That was so bad.
-I can't-- -[Jackie] In your eye.
Can you get it for me, Jackie?
Don't worry. We'll get through this together.

translation.en: Oh, what? 'Cause I can't do it by myself? [laughing]

translation.en: -That was nice. -I'm sorry.
Okay, do it again.
What's our play? Gas the room?
Tranq the T-shirt? Unleash the--

translation.en: I keep saying T-shirt. Teacher. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry.

translation.en: And people would be like, "Oh, why'd you humiliate those Yanks?"

translation.en: And then I'll be like, "It's not out--"
[stammers] ♪ One more time, yeah ♪
His face? Oh, so good! Dylan, as well, she looked so torn.

I love that we all were just waiting!
We got this on lock. Come on!

-Sick teamwork, bro. -Nice save, dog.

[slurring] Why do I take the biggest bite every time?

[all] No!
